product description: Wireless Bluetooth earbuds are standard fare today with smartphone audio ports a thing of the past. Sony's latest entry into the wireless headset market is fantastic with excellent noise cancellation, superb audio quality, and practical functions such as speak-to-chat.
The Unicima V1-WiFi is an affordable compact projector that is lightweight and looks really portable.
Stylish design and solid construction, along with a good specification, put the Spectre x360 14 among the leading 2-in-1 convertibles.

The Nokia X20 offers good battery life, dual SIM support, 5G and a no-frills Android 11 installation, with three years of security updates guaranteed. For all that, it doesn't really do enough to earn a top spot in the competitive mid-range 5G market.

The latest Forerunner model sports unique LTE connectivity, along with all of the great features from the original 945. It may be the best GPS sports watch for those who want to leave the phone behind and benefit from connected safety features.
This is a solid little 2-in-1 Chromebook that does double duty as a standalone tablet. Considering the keyboard and kickstand are bundled, it offers very good value for money.

As a result of the global pandemic, remote work for office workers became a popular option. Along with the move to working from home, many embraced using mechanical keyboards. With the new Keychron K3 ultra-slim design you can easily tote the keyboard between your home and the office.

Garmin continues to improve its GPS watch lineup and improves its AMOLED display watch with several new health and wellness features, an improved heart rate sensor, and longer battery life. Support for HIIT workouts, including custom workouts, sets the Venu 2 apart from most other Garmin watches and makes it the perfect sports watch for multi-activity participants.
The Ezviz C8C is an easy to connect security camera with manual pan, tilt and digital zoom that will enable you to monitor a wide area, and manage your videos through a well-built app.

The Surface Laptop 4 offers performance and battery life in a thin-and-light chassis with a wide range of configurations available. There are trade-offs, but in practice you're unlikely to notice them.

product name: Mophie Powerstation Go Rugged Air Compressor
product description: Mophie is known for its power solutions and this new rugged Powerstation product has all you need for your vehicles, boats, bikes, camping trips, and much more. Power, battery charging, air, and light are all provided by the one handy device that should be ready for any emergency situation.

Garmin has a number of golf devices designed to track your golf game and help you improve. The Approach G12 is an affordable portable range finder that has enough battery capacity for several rounds of golf.

Apple's new 24-inch iMac has a striking design and delivers similar (impressive) performance-per-watt to its M1-based siblings. It's a desirable AIO, but the M1 Mac Mini offers better value for money.

product name: Apple AirTag - anti-loss Bluetooth tag for cellular phone, tablet
product description: Curious what can be done when nearly one billion Apple devices work together? Apple’s AirTags show the potential.

THe Dr. J AK-50 is an affordable projector for home and office that will project office documents and videos in daylight, is easy to use, and relatively portable and would suit home theatre and office applications.
Vankyo Leisure 530W is aimed at both the small-medium office, and the home theatre user
With enough DC and AC power to work and play off the grid, the Jackery Solar Generator 1500 gives you the power you need wherever you happen to be going.
Amazfit offers a few great watches with a focus on health and wellness. It's latest model is built to withstand the rigors of inclement weather outside for a week or two.
Its cyclone dustbin seems to collect a lot of dust from carpets and hard floors, and its lack of roller brush means it will need less maintenance.

The Reolink Argus 3 Pro security camera is an affordable, compact addition to your security camera setup. There are no wires to confound you, and a local recording option if you do not want to be tied into subscription costs.
This compact and affordable air quality monitor syncs to your phone and warns you if mould is likely to be a problem.
The XGIMI Mogo Pro projector is nice and compact -- but it delivers great sound and superb images.

This year, we see TCL launch its second self-branded smartphone series, with the 20 Pro 5G appearing as the flagship. We are testing a pre-production model and are very impressed after a couple of days with the phone.
The ZenBook Duo 14 (UX482) is a capable laptop, but its unique features involve trade-offs, and prospective buyers will have to decide whether or not those trade-offs work for them.
If you need a powerful desktop-replacement laptop that can handle a wide range of graphics and design work, Gigabyte's Aero 17 HDR XC is a good choice that's competitively priced for its market.

The Find X3 Pro has plenty to offer, including Qualcomm's top-end chipset, a superb AMOLED screen and great battery life, but the four-figure price tag may give many prospective buyers pause for thought.
Roborock S7 is a game changer of a two-in-one robot vacuum which will recognise and avoid rugs and carpets to make your life easier.
This premium Bluetooth/USB speaker is certified for Teams and other UC platforms, and performs well for non-work use cases too.
Acer's Swift 3X has plenty of plus points, including Intel's discrete Iris Xe MAX graphics and a competitive price, but we'd like to see another USB-C port and a more robust chassis.
HP’s ZBook Create G7 offers plenty of CPU and GPU muscle, RAM and SSD storage, a superb 4K display and great audio.
For those who want a slightly smaller display, the OnePlus 9 offers much of what the flagship OnePlus 9 Pro offers for $240 less.
Need to digitise some 35mm slides or negatives quickly and easily? PictoScanner offers an affordable solution.

The 13.3-inch Getac B360 is built to take serious knocks and spills, has a super-bright IPS display, plenty of well-protected ports, and can be specified to meet different vertical-market requirements.
Designed to be worn over the ear, Waverly Labs ' translation device is more hygienic for sharing than in-ear buds, and can easily be swapped around among wearers.
Beginners, in particular, will find Luminar AI a useful alternative to the simple image editing tools bundled with most computers.

The RedMagic 6 has flagship specs for optimal gaming and media experiences, but the fast RAM, storage, and processor make it a decent phone for work. The $599 price is reasonable, but there are network trade-offs to consider.

product name: eMeet OfficeCore M2 Max conference speaker
product description: The eMeet OfficeCore M2 Max is pitched at the office user, but if you want an excellent Bluetooth speaker for your home, the M2 Max will not disappoint.
The GMK NucBox is a really cheap Windows 10 PC that performs well and looks good on your desk.
It is easy to forget you are wearing the Mu6 Ring open-air headphones. Listen to the sounds you want without shutting yourself off from the rest of the world

Lenovo's AMD-based ThinkPad T14s offers an excellent keyboard, solid build, good performance and impressive battery life. But if you want a 4K screen, Thunderbolt 3 support or a 2TB SSD, you'll need to choose an Intel-based model.

A laser engraver allows you to create custom art, personalize your things, and even cut out objects. This technology is becoming more affordable and user friendly with the latest DAJA product supporting full use through your smartphone.
The Ezviz C3X is a well-build outdoor security camera with some great features like motion setection zones, voice alerts and strobe lights to warn off intruders.
The Oukitel WP10 is a superb rugged phone with durability, an extra long battery life and some useful tools.
This is an excellent wide-screen monitor with few drawbacks in terms of features and performance, but there's no getting around the fact that it's expensive at $1,599.99.

We've seen increased adoption of mid-range Android smartphones and data from last year shows two out of the top six were Redmi devices. The Redmi Note 9 was just announced and looks to be a solid option for the cost-conscious buyer.

The Podcaster Essentials kit might be overkill for simple video calls with colleagues, but it will be a useful upgrade if you need to record and edit online presentations and marketing materials, or create podcasts and vlogs.
Despite being astonishingly light, LG's 2021 Gram 17 has a tough (MIL-STD 810G-tested) chassis. The screen and internal specs are excellent, although battery life could be better.
It's no powerhouse, and battery life could be an issue if you opt for the 4K display, but HP's diminutive 14-inch ZBook Firefly 14 G7 offers plenty for the demanding remote worker.
The Vastking KingPad K10 Pro is a great package of a tablet, cover, keyboard and stylus for an affordable price.

The Trust IRIS offers good 4K image quality with an HDR mode for challenging lighting conditions, and a compact remote with access to plenty of functions, including tracking modes and full manual pan-tilt-zoom control.
The Portégé X40-J-11C packages an up-to-date spec in a solid chassis, delivering good connectivity and all-day battery life.

product name: Kensington StudioDock iPad Docking Station for iPad Pro 12.9" - docking station - USB-C - HDMI
product description: If you work on a iPad Pro or iPad Air and want to get more out of it, the StudioDock is worth a look.

Samsung dropped the entry price of its S21 Ultra $200 and set the bar for Android phones in 2021. OnePlus just trumped that move with a phone that offers a cleaner experience and charging innovations for about $200 less.

Samsung's new Galaxy S21 5G is a breath of fresh air and a great way to start 2021 with a Samsung price cut of $200 off its entry-level flagship line. The phone looks great, is easy to handle, and has internal specifications worthy of a higher price.
This portable 15.6-inch USB-C touch screen has a clever folding case and a built-in battery. It gives you more screen room and has a lot of features, but the user interface is confusing.
If you're looking for a way to increase the overall audio quality of your video calls or podcast, the Tula Mic does just that.
The Oukitel C22 Android phone is a nice, affordable, slimline phone with pared-down features and decent battery size.
The GL-iNet Beryl travel router is simple to configure and use, compact and light, and will securely cope with up to 40 simultaneously connected devices.

As a proof-of-concept for folding screens, Lenovo's ThinkPad X1 Fold is exemplary. But as an everyday convertible tablet/laptop it's expensive and under-specified, with too many usability compromises.
The Jomise K7 is a decent dash cam with some clever additional features like green light alerts and electronic fence alerts.

The Portégé X30W-J is a sub-1kg convertible 13.3-inch laptop that functions well in tablet mode. The keyboard features large, easy-to-hit keys, but suffers from issues surrounding flex, key action and noise.
If you regularly need translation services the Langogo Summit AI translator is the device you need on your travels around the world.
Xiaomi has done well to hit a competitive price point for the Snapdragon 888-powered Mi 11, which right now sets the bar for other mid-priced flagship-class handsets to aim at.
The costlier MX Ergo may have two more buttons and additional features, but Logitech's M575 is a great choice for an entry-level trackball.

The versatile display and impressive performance of Acer's ConceptD 7 Ezel will have a lot of appeal for designers who need a powerful digital drawing board that’s suitable for working at home or in the office.
There is little to dislike with the Coolpo AI Huddle Pana video conference camera. It makes web conferencing as simple as plug-in and play.
This thin and light touch-screen has a sleek design, but the resolution is moderate and extras put the price up.

Power your entire mobile office with this go-anywhere power bank for real DC & AC power on the go. If your working adventures take you off the grid for days at a time, the Jackery Solar Generator 1000 is a no brainer.
The Ilife A80 Max is certainly the robot vacuum to buy if you want a single-function no fuss robot vacuum that can be managed with either an app or a remote control
I've been riding electric scooters for a few years and the new Slidgo X8 solves a few issues I've experienced in the past while still being available for a reasonable price.
This convertible laptop offers plenty of features, solid industrial design and all-day battery life, and is highly recommended.
The reMarkable 2 E Ink tablet is an excellent device for basic note-taking, but it's pricey and there are still some text-conversion issues. A backlight would be appreciated, too.
Panasonic's PressIT WPS lets you share screens wirelessly on large meeting room displays, offering a good set of features at a competitive price.

product name: Netgear Orbi 4G LTE Advanced Tri-band Router (LBR20)
product description: This mesh Wi-Fi router offers 4G LTE broadband as either a primary or secondary backup internet connection. It's a good 802.11ac (WiFi 5) router, but we'd like to see an 802.11ax (WiFi 6) version.
The ILife V80 Maxis an affordable powerful vacuum with a simplified app, and a comprehensive remote control to manage its features.
This transparent, open-source, end-to-end encrypted chat alternative offers a bare-bones user experience and many integration options for IT departments to build on.
The Bluetti AC50S portable power station has everything you need when the power goes out at home, or in your office.

product name: ANNKE CZ400 PoE IP Audio Security Camera
product description: The Annke CZ400 PoE security camera is a good, solid camera that gives excellent coverage of your space -- without the need for mains power.
The Thinkware F200 Pro is a really nice unobtrusive dash cam that will alert you to potential dangers, keep your speed as it should be and warn you if your attention starts to wander.

Samsung's new Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G looks to improve in key areas that were questionable in the S20 while also bringing S Pen functionality from the Note line. We'll be spending many more hours with this new phone over the next few weeks so stay tuned for more.
Unlike most security cameras, the Homam indoor security camera has no monthly fees and no cloud storage.

product name: Samsung Galaxy Tab Active 3 - tablet - Android - 64 GB - 8" - 3G, 4G
product description: Critical functions of frontline workers are more prominent today than ever before. The new Samsung Galaxy Tab Active 3 provides businesses with a remote work solution that is affordable and built to withstand work in the field, on the go, and in the office.
The 13.3-inch ThinkPad X13 Yoga Gen 1 is a credible alternative to Lenovo's larger and more expensive ThinkPad X1 Yoga, although its battery life could be better.

The latest version of Parallels' remote desktop and application system has its own improvements, but is also designed to let organisations mix and match their own infrastructure with Azure’s Windows Virtual Desktop service.

While Google didn't release a high end flagship in 2020, it looks like this may have been the best strategy for customers. The Pixel 4a 5G is one of the most affordable 5G phones available today and has arguably one of the best cameras on a smartphone today.

While Bose and Sony dominate the conversation for ANC cans providing outstanding music experiences, Jabra is focused on making the best headsets for business. The Evolve2 85 headset extensive Teams support, has outstanding battery life, and 10 mics for high-quality speech performance.
Intel’s 11th-generation Core processors and Thunderbolt 4 should keep the XPS 13 2-in-1 at the forefront of the convertible ultraportable market, but it’s not fault-free.

ZTE is known for innovation in the smartphone market with first dual rear cameras, first foldable phone, and one of the first to 5G. The front-facing camera, sensors, and handset speaker are all under the display so that users experience a front that is nearly all display.

Garmin's newest smart scale provides more than simply weight tracking capability. The color display on the scale can also show your BMI, body fat percentage bone mass, weather and more. It's a rather expensive WiFi scale, but it seamlessly connects with the Garmin ecosystem.
The Avita Admiror is a really nice laptop that is certainly worth coveting. At under $800, its price certainly does belie its features.
Adding 1.9TB of high-endurance, power-loss protected NVMe SSD cache to your NAS isn’t cheap, but it does boost performance.
The case is a joke, there's no doubt about that. But I'm keeping Apple's newest headphones.
Pleexy isn't another task management app, but a service that lets you integrate tasks from multiple sources and services into Microsoft To Do or Todoist.
The Avita Pura would suit your kids’ educational needs and will perform well for the home worker.
The ZenBook 14 UX435EG has an up-to-date high-end configuration, a comfortable (but noisy) keyboard, an excellent IPS screen and all-day battery life. ScreenPad may be an acquired taste, though.

We've seen increased adoption of mid-range Android smartphones and data from last year shows two out of the top six were Redmi devices. The Redmi Note 9 was just announced and looks to be a solid option for the cost-conscious buyer.

product name: LG TONE Free FN7 wireless ANC
product description: LG released the TONE Free HBS-FN6 headset in the middle of last year and the earbuds offered everything one would want, including a UV bacteria killing light. The new FN7 model replaces the UV light with active noise cancellation and it looks like LG may have some of the best wireless earbuds that few know about.
The new M1-based MacBook Air throws down the gauntlet for rival ultraportable laptops, offering speedy performance and outstanding two-day battery life.
The AOSO S3 robot vacuum is a fast and efficient single mode sweeper with an app that works, and is easy to connect to.

Remote workers and mobile professionals will appreciate this sturdy laptop, which comes in traditional and 2-in-1 formats. Battery life and audio are particularly strong, and mobile broadband (4G or 5G) is available if you need it.

The Mate 40 Pro is well designed and built, has a great OLED screen and excellent cameras, delivers good battery life, and there are some nice features in EMUI 11. But it's hard to recommend without Google apps and services.
The iPhone 12 Pro Max is the biggest phone Apple has ever made.

The HP EliteBook 840 G7 is a well-built 14-inch business laptop with good connectivity and excellent battery life. However, the screen on the entry-level model lacks brightness, and sound quality could be better.
Apple's M1 chip once again proves its worth, helping to deliver a combination of performance and price that makes the late-2020 Mac Mini excellent value for office use, or for working from home.
Many of us grew up folding and flying paper airplanes. With the new PowerUp 4.0 propeller system we can now fly these same planes for up to 10 minutes with control from our modern smartphones.
The Orbi Pro WiFi 6 is expensive, but its speed and ability to configure multiple networks for different groups makes it a good option for business users who are now working from home.
The Moto G9 Plus delivers a reasonable specification -- including good battery life, a large 6.8-inch screen and some nice customisation features and controls -- at a budget price.
This well-made 6.4-inch Snapdragon 720G-based phone offers excellent value for money, if you don't need 5G.

LG continues to offer unique smartphone form factors and the new LG Wing is one of the more interesting approaches with a T-shaped form factor. It's optimized for content creation, extra functionality in a single application, and small screen dual app usage.
With military-grade build quality, all-day battery life and up to a Core i7 processor, HP's Pro c640 Chromebook has plenty going for it, but the screen's lack of brightness lets it down.

The new entry-level iPad delivers a big performance improvement over its predecessor while maintaining good battery life. It's affordable enough for home users but powerful enough for mainstream business users.
The extensive collection of ports and connectors provided by HP's USB-C Dock G5 will be ideal for anyone wanting to connect a display or other accessories to their laptop.
After a month of using Google's Pixel 5, it's clear the company has found its smartphone niche.

The 6.1-inch Xperia 5 II packs an updated specification into a more easily handled chassis than the 6.5-inch Xperia 1 II. The 21:9 OLED screen may not be 4K, but you do get a 120Hz refresh rate and a lower price tag.

product name: Apple MacBook Pro - 13.3" - M1 - 8 GB RAM - 256 GB SSD - US
product description: If you're looking for a fresh design, look elsewhere. But if you're looking for killer performance, long battery life and broad app support, you'll be hard-pressed to find fault with Apple's inaugural M1-based MacBook Pro.

The Zepp Z smartwatch has all of the latest advanced health tracking functionality you expect in a smartwatch today, along with integrated GPS for outdoor activity tracking. There are no third party apps and it's more expensive than other comparable smartwatches.
The Jomise 4k dual dash cam is an affordable dash cam that is easy to configure and fairly unobtrusive in use.

The Jabra Elite 85t earbuds are the next evolution in Jabra's earbud lineup with powerful active noise-cancellation capability with a focus on high-quality calling. They aren't optimized for workouts and are best for commuters, travelers, and remote workers who find over or on the ear headphones uncomfortable.
Vacos is a well built security camera to watch over your property.
The Zenfox T3-3CH triple channel dash cam has front, interior, and rear cameras for peace of mind.
The first true vector graphics app for the iPad is a strong first release that takes advantage of touch options and the precision of the Apple Pencil. But it's not a tool for beginners.
The Vankyo 520W projector is a nice portable projector with a decent-sized screen.
A bright 13.9-inch touchscreen with minimal bezels, Intel's latest 11th-generation processor and a good keyboard make this stylish laptop a pleasure to use.
Apple's latest tablet answers some lingering questions while also giving users a valid option for power and affordability.

The Spectre x360 15's outstanding features are its 15.6-inch screen and its distinctive styling. The bundled stylus and high-quality audio subsystem are plus points too, but battery life could be better.

5G is available in the US and you may think you have to pay a premium to pick up a phone to take advantage of these networks. TCL is offering a very compelling Android smartphone for just $399.99 with Sub-6 and mmWave network support on Verizon.
Blood oxygen measurement is a popular term today with Apple's introduction of it on the Apple Watch. The affordable Amazfit Band 5 supports this sensor, heart rate, menstrual tracking, and more.
Apple has set the bar for smartphones heading into 2021.
The Mako touchscreen monitor is a great portable, ultra-slim monitor that is stable on its stand, stylish to look at, and responsive.
THe Soliom S600 is a nice feature–rich security camera with a superb spotlight do light up your area – with the added bonus of ultra-flexible pan and tilt

While there is not much more than the S Pen offered in the Note 20 Ultra, the Galaxy Tab S7 Plus is the device to purchase if you want to optimize your work with the S Pen. Samsung also addressed most of the problems with the Tab S6 keyboard and this tablet is built for productivity.
WinZip, arguably the best file compression utility, gets some handy new features, including sharing files into Microsoft Teams -- although that's a little more work than we'd like.
Microsoft's first generation Surface Duo is optimized for multi-taskers and offers a glimpse of our productive future. However, it's tough to get past last year's specifications for more than $1,400.
Hobot says the "D" shape is to allow the robot to sweep into corners that usually are missed with a regular round robot. And it does very effectively indeed.
The Reolink RLC-510a is a nice camera that does not need a cloud subscription, or power directly to the camera, and is a great addition to your security set up.

Qualcomm's Snapdragon Wear 4100 platform launched in 2020 and Mobvoi is first out of the gate with a Google Wear OS smartwatch. It's a very fast watch with long battery life and available at a reasonable $300 price.

Some people have difficulty sleeping and the new Amazfit ZenBuds are designed to help you reach a level of serenity so that you drift off peacefully. The earbuds then monitor your sleep, including your heart rate, breathing quality, sleeping position, and more.

At $350 to get started and then $99 a year after the first year, pHin is clearly something that's meant for someone who has a more sophisticated setup than an above-ground pool from Walmart. That's not to say it doesn't help, because it does, tremendously.

product name: HP E27d G4 Advanced Docking Monitor
product description: HP's E27d G4 is an excellent option if you need a high-quality 27-inch display for working at home or in an office. It's pricey, but the built-in docking features will be useful for laptops with limited connectivity.
Value for money is the draw with this Snapdragon 732G-based phone, which has a 6.67-inch 120Hz IPS screen, a large battery and internal storage up to 128GB.

With a couple of updates coming in 2020, there is little reason to consider Google's forgotten Wear OS platform for a smartwatch. Fitbit's advanced health and wellness tracking, along with integrated GPS, make the Versa 3 the best smartwatch for the masses.
The iPlay20 is well-made, runs on an octa-core SoC with 4GB of RAM, and undercuts Amazon's equivalent Fire HD by some distance. It's all the Android tablet most people will ever need.

It's been three years since we've seen integrated GPS in a Fitbit watch form factor and the new Sense has exceeded my expectations. It performs well for 24/7 health tracking and is a solid GPS sports watch too.

product name: Lanmodo Vast Pro night vision camera
product description: The Lanmodo Vast Pro night vision camera shows you the detail you need when driving in the dark.
The sturdy design and programmable versatility of the wireless Pro Type keyboard and Pro Click mouse will appeal to professional users.

Garmin clearly isn't standing by as Apple and Samsung roll out new smartwatches for the masses. The Garmin Venu Sq is a very affordable GPS sports watch with oxygen saturation measurement, respiration tracking, heart rate monitoring, stress tracking, and more.
With great battery life, a large screen, some nice personalisation features and the future-proofing of 5G support, the Moto G 5G Plus is probably the best budget handset around right now.
The Basetation Pro delivers on Apple's AirPower promise, albeit in a different form.

Bluetooth wireless headsets have become a standard today and Amazfit just confirmed you don't have to spend more than $99 for an outstanding option. If you exercise with music then you will appreciate the design elements of the PowerBuds.

The latest Forerunner model from Garmin is a slimmed down 945 without mapping and golf. It has the latest software features and a new Track Run mode that is sure to please those who train on the track.
Samsung's Galaxy A51 performs capably, has a large screen, strong battery life and looks good. It's worth shopping around though, as there's plenty of competition.
A Wifi 6 mesh system could prove a sensible investment if you want to future-proof your home or office network for the IoT era.
For home theater or business use, the Yaber Y30 will satisfy both functions perfectly well for under $280.

The 10.5-inch Surface Go 2's streamlined design and solid performance (with a Core m3 CPU) make for a decent tablet. With an optional keyboard cover it's also a credible compact 2-in-1 laptop, although battery life could be better.
The £599 Cat S62 Pro isn't the only smartphone with an integrated thermal camera, but it's arguably the best currently available.
It's the sort of laptop that would be great to throw into a bag, and head off to an event or meeting. But in these strange times, we've got nowhere to go.

product name: Reolink E1 Zoom indoor security camera
product description: The Reolink E1 Zoom indoor security camera gives you monitoring peace of mind for $70.
The Onson J10C is an affordable robot vacuum that will clean and clean until it finally runs out of batteries.
Despite its long-in-the-tooth Core i5 processor and some other lower-spec components, the 15.6-inch AeroBook Plus offers enough to deliver a convincing budget package.
The Doogee N20 Pro is a nice looking entry-level smartphone with really good cameras for a range of scenarios, and little shutter lag.
This major new release of the original low-code app builder adds JavaScript support and AI models, but some options are still Apple-centric.

After a couple of weeks with the new Z Fold 2, it's clear Samsung is leading the industry in smartphone innovation. Everything but S Pen support is packed into this new device, and you can now toss out that small tablet, too.
Bringing the latest CorelDRAW features to technical illustrators, with some improvements to callouts and labels, is a useful but minor upgrade.
The Reolink Go PT gives you wire-free surveillance almost anywhere there is a cell phone signal.
Dynabook squeezes a 15-inch FHD screen into a lightweight chassis, but there's room for improvement in design, build quality and battery life.

If you want a compact and affordable handset that's guaranteed early Android updates, don't mind a relatively small screen and appreciate the simplicity of point-and-shoot photography, Google might just have nailed it with the Pixel 4a.
The challenge for Apple with this new Intel-based iMac is to reassure Mac users that it is business-as-usual -- and, on that score, the new 27-inch iMac ticks all the boxes.
The 360 S9 delivers a really good sweeping and mopping experience that matches the performance of many high-end robot vacuums.
The Selpic P1 hand-held printer gives reliable printing from a hand-held device.

Samsung's latest Note series release offers a flagship smartphone with more improvements than last year's Note 10 series. If the S Pen is important to your daily work, the Note 20 Ultra 5G is the best phone you can buy today.

The 21:9 aspect ratio is the key draw here, along with an attractive price. But you can expect some usability challenges navigating the screen one-handed, while the camera performance could be better.
The 360 S5 robot vacuum has a well-written app, no-go zones, zone cleaning abilities, and is quiet in use.
The Reolink Argus PT is an unobtrusive security camera with pan and tilt features and an impressive solar panel that provides power even on dull days.
The 498P9 is a neat all-in-one solution for users who would otherwise need to use two large Quad HD displays.
The first true wireless buds from OnePlus deliver a decent audio experience and pretty good battery life, and have an all-important water resistance rating.
The orginal Mi Electric Scooter established the standard for getting around easily on a scooter. The newest Pro 2 model improves in several areas, making an efficient ride even better.

The Garmin MARQ wearables are labeled as modern tool watches with each model focused a different sport. For the past few weeks I've been wearing the luxurious MARQ Golfer 24/7 to track my activity, sleep, health, running, cycling, and of course my marginal golf game.

product name: Cubot King Kong CS rugged phone
product description: The Cubot King Kong CS is an entry level phone with the added advantage of it being durable and rugged.

In January LG released the TONE Free HBS-FL7 and while it was a very good headset the form factor was not built to wear while exercising. The new TONE Free HBS-FN6 improves in this area and also sells at a more competitive $150.

While the masses look to Samsung for innovation, sleek designs, and phones with lots of extra, enterprise users need a tool to get work done. The new Samsung Galaxy XCover Pro is built for that customer and withstands the elements too at an affordable $500 price.
Returning to its affordable mid-range roots, OnePlus has got the mix right with the Nord, with highlights including a great AMOLED screen, good front and rear cameras, 5G and dual SIMs.
The Yaber Y61 a compact portable projector for your home theatre entertainment
The ThinkBook Plus is a decent 13.3-inch business laptop with a key addition: an extra 10.8-inch E-Ink touchscreen built into the outside of the lid.
This affordable 6-inch e-book reader offers a wide range of file support, including easy linking to public library ebook loans.
The Akaso Brave 7LE action camera is is a superb camera that can be controlled remotely, and has all the extras you could need for your active life.

For years LG has released G and V series devices, but is changing its naming convention and the LG Velvet is the first to launch in the US. It's a rather compelling 5G phone priced at $600 with a Dual Screen cover option and stylus support.

product name: Rock Space home mesh wifi system
product description: The Rock Space mesh Wi-Fi system will make you wish you had installed a mesh system years ago.
The new version 11 of macOS paves the way for the future of the Mac platform.
The Yeedi K700 robot vacuum will wash and mop your floors quietly and efficiently – without the need for voice control – or a difficult-to-install app

There has been a battle waging for years between Bose and Sony for the title of best the wireless active-noise canceling cans. After more than a week of intensive time with the new Sony WH-1000XM4 I think it is clear we have a winner.
The Neabot robot vacuum is a superb vacuum with an ingenious hopper feature that promises to free you up from the daily task of emptying your dustbin every day.
This smart security camera offers a full range of features for a competitive price, but is let down by its confusing app.
The Timekettle M2 translator enabling confident conversation in another language with offline and music capabilities too.
These true wireless earbuds are a good fit, pair easily, have a usable control system and good ambient noise filtering for voice calls. Just beware the relatively short battery life.
There's a lot to recommend the Xperia 1 II, including flagship-class features and sleek industrial design. It's Sony's best phone for some time, but price is likely to be the main issue.
The Cat S42 is tough, affordable, offers good enterprise features, and the battery life is excellent. But it has a number of issues, and competition is hotting up in the rugged smartphone sector.
The Hachi Infinite is an interactive touchscreen projector and standalone smart home entertainment system that turns a surface ito a multi-touch screen.

The P40 Pro+ is a beautifully designed flagship handset, with a superb five-camera array at the back (provided you don't overdo the digital zoom). But without access to Google apps and services, it's hard to recommend at the price.
The veteran natural painting package keeps improving, with useful Mac options like using an iPad as a second screen, solid feature improvements and a new subscription model.
If you're attracted by a large screen and a lightweight chassis, and your workloads aren't too demanding, the LG Gram 17 (2020) should fit the bill nicely.

A few new fully wireless Bluetooth earphones include active noise cancellation, but that usually ends up increasing the price significantly. Mobvoi just released a new option that offers much of the same experience as earbuds priced twice as much.

While paying $1,000 for a smartphone today is common, there are phones that are much more affordable and purpose built for your various needs. Unihertz just launched its latest compact smartphone that is great for communication and portable use, with prices starting at $129.
The Heimvision HM302 security camera has some impressive features and a 360-degree view of your space.

This year's update may not be an essential upgrade for owners of more recent models, but it ensures that the 13-inch MacBook Pro continues to offer an attractive, portable design and strong performance for business users.
This is an extremely configurable rugged tablet with an ultra-bright screen, a stylus, programmable buttons and excellent protection for working in extreme environments.
The OnDash N4 dash cam is a very impressive camera for your car with superb night vision features.
The Timekettle Zero translator lets me chat to people face to face and get near-instant translation.

The Dynabook Portégé X30L-G is incredibly light at 870g, and benefits from a good range of ports and slots, while the IGZO screen's low power consumption contributes to impressive all-day battery life.
The Chromebook Flip C436 is a visually pleasing, solidly made and ergonomic Chromebook -- but it's also one of the most expensive.
The VivoBook S14 is a durable and efficient Windows 10 Pro laptop with a nifty touchpad-embedded calculator. All-day battery life is another plus point, but beware the flexy keyboard.

With the current coronavirus situation, millions of office workers are working from home. If you are using AirPods or some other headset that is not optimized for work, consider picking up the new Logitech Zone Wired headset with Microsoft Teams certification.

As fully wireless earbuds continue to improve, active-noise canceling (ANC) is becoming the standard for high-end models. While Sony's competitor excels in audio performance, they are too large and heavy to handle many activities.
The eMeet Luna is a superb stylish speaker, which is perfect for the medium-sized meeting room or small home office.
Huawei's MateBook X Pro (2020) is a high-quality 13.9-inch laptop, but there are issues with the webcam and screen brightness regulation.
The 2020 XPS 13 is a superb 13.4-inch ultraportable laptop: compact and portable, yet durable, it's fast, with a great screen and an excellent keyboard.

Talk to your visitors without answering the door, or pair it with a camera to see and hear who wants to come in. Arlo's audio doorbell is both simple and flexible, but we'd like a little more customisation.

During these uncertain times where businesses are strategizing ways to survive, Apple released its most affordable smartphone to help you get work done with few compromises. With Touch ID, the new iPhone SE is also perfect for those wearing face coverings at their essential businesses.
All in all, the Roborock S6 MaxV is a superb high-end robot vacuum with obstacle avoidance and an app that is easy to configure. For $749, it could be the only robot vacuum you will ever need to buy.

product name: Intel Next Unit of Computing Kit 9 Pro Kit - NUC9VXQNX - mini PC - Xeon E-2286M 2.4 GHz - 0 GB
product description: Nine generations after it first appeared, Intel has added a Xeon processor into its Next Unit of Computing, and it is quite the charmer.

product name: Ecovacs Deebot Ozmo T8 AIVI robot vacuum
product description: The Ecovacs Deebot Ozmo T8 AIVI is an AI-driven floor cleaning robot that has every feature you could need in a multi-purpose robot -- and a video and microphone that can scan your home whilst you are away.
With the loss of 3.5mm audio jacks, wireless headphones are standard fare. Google's latest wireless earbuds are exactly what Android users needed to challenge the dominance of the AirPods.
I tried the Netvue 1080p Vigil security camera for external surveillance, and I was so impressed with it, I bought two more.
The Moto G8 delivers a good set of features and capabilities at a competitive sub-£200 price, but the 720p screen resolution and lack of NFC could deter some buyers.
This task manager has a deliberately Wunderlist-like look and feel, and some interesting features aimed especially at those outside the Microsoft ecosystem.
If you need to increase your home network's security or clamp down on your kids' internet access, Firewalla is an affordable option.
The SimCan1S is a sturdy indoor security camera with AI facial recognition and no cloud storage fees.
I tried the Netvue Orb 1080p security camera and was impressed by its indoor detection, remote control  and two-way voice features.
A leading-edge chipset, plenty of RAM and storage, six cameras (two front, four back) plus good battery life and fast charging all add up to great value for money, despite one or two rough edges.

product name: Apple Magic Keyboard - keyboard and folio case - with trackpad - US
product description: A couple of weeks of use later, and Apple's Magic Keyboard for iPad Pro has become one of my favorite iPad accessories ever.

Motorola may be doing itself a disservice by having quite so many One-series handsets, but the One Hyper is a decent effort with a large screen, a high-resolution main camera, good battery life and a competitive price.

LG continues to offer up its Dual Screen cover as an option for its flagship devices and with the LG V60 we have a serious productivity machine priced hundreds less than competing Galaxy S20 devices. Outstanding battery life, 5G network support, and amazing sound make this one to consider.
Despite its low price and support for Google Mobile Services, jerky scrolling and delays following screen presses on the Huawei Y6s might prove a deal-breaker for many buyers.

To help people stay connected during this unprecedented time, Nuu Mobile is providing a free Mint Mobile three-month 5GB SIM card and a protective case with an X6 purchase. This capable Android phone is priced at only $100 and the Mint Mobile service equals about half the price of the phone.

As it stands, it's difficult to recommend the Huawei Mate 30 Pro unless you're willing to use workarounds to get Google apps on-board, or are confident that the current software challenges will soon be overcome.
Apple's iPad line has slowly evolved into a full-fledged laptop replacement for many. In a series of updates, here's what it's like to play, work, and live with it.

Machine learning-powered tools, improved performance and several 'user inspired' fixes make the new CorelDRAW Graphics Suite a useful update. But the new collaboration features, while promising, need a better workflow.

Activity and fitness trackers are usually found in either watch or band form factors. For the first time ever, Fitbit released one of its band form factor devices with integrated GPS and it should satisfy those looking for a tiny form factor with more accurate outdoor fitness tracking.
Huawei's P40 Pro offers great industrial design and leading-edge cameras, but software limitations make it hard to recommend.

HP's Neverstop multifunction laser printers ditch toner cartridges in favour of a refillable system, offering impressively low running costs. However, there are some missing features, even on the top-end model.
Great performance, fast wireless charging, waterproofing and a 120Hz screen are standout features of OnePlus's new top-end handset.
If you like simplicity in your life, for under $190 the A4s Pro is the robot vacuum cleaner for you.
This USB-C keyboard case and hub aims to turn an iPad Pro into a MacBook: it has the look, but not the feel.

product name: Samsung Galaxy Watch Active2 - black stainless steel - smart watch with band - black - 4 GB - AT&T
product description: The Apple Watch is arguably the best smartwatch available today, but it also requires that you use an Apple iPhone. Android smartphone users, and iOS users too, have an option that in many ways is even better than the Apple Watch in the Samsung Galaxy Watch Active 2.
This stylish mid-priced laptop has plenty going for it, including neat screen-sharing and file-transfer features with compatible Huawei/Honor phones, but there are also some significant drawbacks.
The Roborock S5 Max is a really powerful vacuum cleaner with an easy-to-use app and an integrated automated mopping function.
With a slim but robust design and all-day battery life, the 14-inch ThinkPad T495s should prove a reliable platform for office software, email and web browsing when you're on the road.
The Deebot OZMO 920 from Ecovacs is a superb multi-function robot vacuum that is easy to connect to the app and configure

The Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra 5G launches in March and with it, Samsung has set the bar for 2020 smartphones with specifications and price. It's a very large phone, but packs a lot of innovation and tech into the package to help you get work done.
At under $200 this versatile eMeet OfficeCore M2 conference speaker is perfect for small and medium-sized businesses.
The Zendure SuperHub will solve the problems of carrying several power supplies round with you when you travel.
With a large minimal-bezel screen, a pop-up front camera, decent performance and good battery life, Honor's 9X Pro has plenty to offer. What it doesn't offer, though, is Google Mobile Services.
Samsung's latest trio of smartphones are similar, yet feel so different. The S20 Plus, on paper and in real-world use, is the model that just feels right for most.
Creative professionals requiring serious computing power should check out HP's ZBook 17 G6. But don't expect to carry it far, or the battery to last all day.
The ZenBook Flip 15 UX563FD offers a high-quality 4k touch screen, a stylus and discrete Nvidia graphics. Creative types may even find uses for the secondary ScreenPad.
10th-generation Intel Core processors, Wi-Fi 6 and good battery life make the competitively priced Satellite Pro L50-G an attractive proposition for businesses.
The budget smartphone market is now a crowded space. The 6.3-inch Moto G8 Plus does little wrong, but there are now many competitive alternatives to choose from.
VanTop Moment 6S action camera is a nice camera with all the accessories and fixings for a variety of activities. It's a low-cost camera to suit your budget.
It's still early days for WiFi 6, so the Orbi WiFi 6 mesh system isn't an essential upgrade at the moment. But if you can afford it, there's impressive performance and capacity on offer.
Sense Energy Monitor
The Amarey A980 performs well, operates to a cleaning schedule in the app, and can be controlled by voice. All you will need to remember is to empty the dustbin from time to time.
This affordable 1080p/60fps webcam is aimed at anyone who's into online video and content streaming.
The Elite Dragonfly offers elegant and robust industrial design, an excellent keyboard, a good selection of ports, plenty of configuration options, and good performance and battery life.
Although there are compromises to achieve an affordable price point, the 6.5-inch Oppo A5 still offers excellent battery life, a smart industrial design and more.
This is an attractive piece of kit with a well thought-out user interface, but its functionality doesn't quite justify the price.
The Yoga C940 builds on last year's excellent C930, improving the innovative soundbar speaker and packing everything into a slightly smaller case.

OnePlus has been pushing traditional smartphone makers for years and with the new OnePlus 7T Pro 5G McLaren device it becomes one of the first to support T-Mobile's nationwide 5G network. It is an extremely capable device that is sure to please early adopters with cool McLaren orange highlights in the hardware and software.
You get a lot of handset for your money with the Mi Note 10, especially in the camera department. However, performance is middling, and there are some missing features.

It's not cheap, but Netgear's portable Nighthawk M2 can access 4GX LTE mobile broadband at up to 2Gbps, create a local wi-fi network, plug into a wired network and recharge your mobile devices if need be.
This year, I am going to cook my holiday dinner on the barbecue, and I am going to use the Smartfire barbecue controller to guarantee the results will be just right.
Mobile knowledge workers who are also Surface enthusiasts with deep pockets will love this ARM-based tablet/laptop. Gamers and creative types should look elsewhere, for now.

The Jabra Elite 75t earbuds improve upon an already great audio experience with a smaller form factor to fit more ears, longer battery life, and modern USB-C charging port. This year's model improves in all areas where people wanted to see improvements, making it one of the best set of wireless earbuds available today.

Considering its price, there's plenty to like about the Oppo A9 2020. Two SIMs, plenty of storage, a 6.5-inch screen, two speakers and excellent battery life, with reverse charging, is an appealing bundle for the money.

product name: Viofo A129 Pro Duo dash cam
product description: The Viofo A129 is a nice little dash cam with an excellent app and easy-to-use buttons that will give you the peace of mind you need when out on the road.
It doesn't look like a rugged phone, but the mid-range Cat S52 can still handle rough treatment while delivering decent performance for mainstream tasks.
The Doogee S95 Pro is a very useful rugged phone with superb add-on modules that will take rough handling in its stride.
This surprise revamp injects new life into Apple's professional laptop range, offering a bigger screen, impressive performance and battery life, and improved audio.

Despite a somewhat cramped touchpad and concerns about the keyboard's spill resistance, the 14-inch Toughbook 55 has a lot going for it, including long battery life and a range of user-configurable options.

Over the years I have run with a variety of wireless earbuds with models in the $180 to $200 range best meeting my needs. Amazon recently launched its entry into this space and at $130 the Echo Buds are the headphones most should consider this holiday season.
The 15.6-inch ConceptD 3 Pro can tackle high-end graphics work, but it's bulky and heavy, with limited display resolution and disappointing battery life.

product name: iPhone 11 Pro Max Smart Battery Case with Wireless Charging - Black
product description: Apple's Smart Battery Case for the iPhone 11 lineup is smarter than ever.

product name: Plantronics Backbeat Pro 5100 True Wireless Earbuds
product description: Comfortable to wear and with good audio quality, including noise-cancelling, the Backbeat Pro 5100 earbuds are a solid competitor for Apple’s AirPods.
For less than £300, the Honor 9X offers good battery life, a large notch-free screen, plenty of internal storage, acceptable cameras and a distinctive chassis.

Garmin has always beaten the smartwatch market, including the Apple Watch and Samsung Galaxy Watch models, when it comes to the vast amount of health data tracked by its wearables. With the inclusion of a brilliant AMOLED display, the Venu is clearly a wearable built for the masses.
Huawei's mid-range Nova 5T offers an attractively-priced combination of design, features and performance, but there’s plenty of competition at this price point.
With workaday design and moderate build quality, the Portégé A30-E has a 'bare bones' feel about it.
Skydio's latest drone is still smart, and easier to fly with new manual flying via a phone app, controller or beacon.
The Cubot King Kong 3 is a decent rugged phone for under $200.
The ConceptD 7 combines high-end graphics performance with a slimline design and a competitive price, but the 4K screen doesn't support DCI-P3 and battery life could be better.
The Cubot X19 is a superb sleek phone at a very affordable price.

The Google Pixelbook set the bar for Chromebooks and with the Pixelbook Go Google offers a premium experience in a laptop form factor. It's priced higher than Chromebooks from others, but there are Google features to help you get work done.
The iLife A9 is a nice robot vacuum, and for under $280, it will simplify your house cleaning routine and automate a tedious floor cleaning job.
Like its larger Xperia 1 stablemate, the 6.1-inch Xperia 5 has a 21:9 OLED screen. As well as being more affordable, the Xperia 5 is more usable for those who struggle with large-screen phones.
The Puppyoo R6 Home has great potential. It is a great looking device with good cleaning function, a great dustbin mechanism, and good area mapping.
You could get a higher spec for the same money, but Fairphone has loftier aims than a simple price/performance calculation.
This 7-inch e-book reader delivers an uncluttered reading experience, and offers a credible alternative to top-end devices like Kobo’s Forma and the Kindle Oasis.

With an excellent OLED screen, classy industrial design, decent performance and good battery life, the Reno 2Z represents superb value for money. Support for two SIMs and a MicroSD card at the same time are welcome extras, but the quad rear camera system may be overkill.
The lightweight and compact 13.3-inch Portégé X30-F has a good keyboard, decent battery life and Wi-Fi 6 support, but the lid has more flex than we'd like.
If you are in the market for a Surface Laptop or Macbook Air, the choice really comes down to two things: Size, and political loyalty.

While people may think the iPad is the only tablet available, Samsung's latest offers up a comparable tablet for hundreds less. The Tab S6 is a refined piece of technology that is only limited by a poor keyboard accessory.
After using the Series 5 for a couple of weeks, it's clear this is what the Apple Watch should have always been.

Garmin continues to offer a number of watches as it works to provide options for everyone. The Vivoactive 4 is a great option for those who want a touchscreen interface with 24/7 health tracking and support for gym and bodyweight workouts.
The Mi 9T Pro has a great 6.39-inch Super AMOLED screen, a long-lasting 4,000mAh battery, a very capable triple rear camera system and a pop-up selfie camera.
LG’s V50 ThinQ 5G is a 5G smartphone with a difference: it comes with a hinged cover that incorporates a second screen. If this doesn’t appeal, you’ll probably want to look elsewhere.
It's clear the iPhone 11 is the iPhone for the masses.
The Avita Liber is a solid laptop for office and homework, which will more than meet your needs.

Matthew Miller drove eight hours to get his hands on the future. And while Samsung's new Galaxy Fold is not a phone for most people, if you want to experience an engineering marvel that takes you a step closer to the Holy Grail of One Device, read Matthew's full review.

Want to track personal items, your dog, or even a kid who isn't old enough to have a phone? That's where the GeoZilla Tracker shines. The $50 Tracker connects to GPS and GSM networks worldwide and reports its location at an interval of your choosing.

While most flagship phones push the $1,000 price point, OnePlus recently launched a new version of its OnePlus 7 at a $599 price. It has some of the highest specifications available today and performs at a level far above its price.
Apple's newest iPad continues changing the narrative about how much an iPad can do.
HP's 13.3-inch 2-in-1 convertible offers robustness, good features and business-class security. Drawbacks include limited viewing angles and moderate audio quality.
It's hard to find a combination of features that will satisfy both business users and consumers. Lenovo's ThinkBook is a creditable effort, but it's not without drawbacks.
Parallels Desktop 15 supports a wider range of PC software than ever before, and is a genuine 'best of both worlds' option that allows Mac users to run key Windows business apps.
The AKASO V50 is a set-it-and-forget-it camera that will certainly suit most of your outdoor needs

The ThinkPad X1 Yoga (4th Gen) is a slim but solidly built 360-degree convertible with support for a 4K screen and mobile broadband, plus a stylus with on-device housing and plenty of security features.

While flagship phones are priced over $1,000 it is good to see there are still good quality affordable smartphones. The Galaxy A50 is one third the cost of the latest flagships and Xfinity Mobile offers attractive pricing on the Verizon cellular network.
If you can afford it, the XPS 15 is a powerful laptop with a superb screen, plenty of internal storage, good battery life and a very robust design.
Logitech's new MX mouse and keyboard are pricey, but should suit power users who want quick shortcuts and people who regularly switch between a laptop and desktop PC.
The 2019 ThinkPad X1 Carbon is lighter and adds welcome features like PrivacyGuard and PrivacyAlert. The 4K screen is impressive, but does involve some trade-offs — notably battery life.
DT Research's 14-inch DT340T is tough and capable (and heavy), but if you specify the discrete Nvidia GPU and maximise RAM, SSD storage and battery capacity you’ll end up with a hefty price tag.
HP's ZBook 14u G6 packs a punch thanks to its high-end Core i7 processor and discrete AMD graphics, but its 4K screen can be a drain on the battery.

Fitbit saw solid success with last year's Versa, but stumbled a bit with the Versa Lite. The Versa 2 improves on the original in every area and is worth consideration at $200 if you are looking for a 24/7 activity tracker in a watch form factor.
The Xidu PhilPro 2 in 1 tablet includes an attachable keyboard and stylus in this low cost Windows tablet
Looking for a smart light bulb that doesn't cost a lot? We found it.
The convertible Tablet Lifebook U939X is very portable, with good connectivity, two webcams and a bundled stylus.

Jaybird has been building headphones for athletes for nearly a decade and after a couple of iterations with the Run series it has stepped up to success with the new Vista model. They have great custom sound, excellent fit and comfort, long battery life, and flawless performance in single and stereo configurations.
The 4K screen is impressive, but unfortunately Chuwi's Atom-powered LapBook Plus lacks the horsepower to do a lot of the things you'd buy a 4K laptop to do.
Sennheiser's MB 360 UC scores highly on audio quality and battery life is good, but some users may have wearability and usability issues, so try before you buy.
The Nebula Capsule II delivers decent image quality and sound, but battery life could be better.
The ZenBook 14 UX434FL is a lightweight yet robust 14-inch laptop. The ScreenPad may or may not appeal, but don't let that distract you from the rest of what's on offer here.
The Pocketalk translator will give you the confidence you need when travelling and you do not speak the local language.

The Reno 10x Zoom offers excellent value for money: performance and battery life are good, and the industrial design is both eye-catching and robust. There's no IP rating, and wireless charging isn't supported, but we have little else to complain about.

The new entry-level 13-inch MacBook Pro delivers better value for money than its Touch Bar-less predecessor, offering strong battery life and lightweight design for business users who need a speedy but portable workhorse laptop.
The Zone Wireless Plus performs well, is comfortable to wear, and its controls are easy to understand and use.

product name: ILIFE Shinebot W400 floor washing robot
product description: The ILIFE Shinebot W400 is a superb addition to any home or office with hard flooring who wants a robot floor washer.
Sit back and relax knowing that your car is as protected as possible, with this very unobtrusive dash cam from Thinkware.

product name: Philips Brilliance LCD Monitor with USB-C Dock
product description: The large 4K display of the Brilliance 329P9H is well suited for presentations, video editing and graphics work. However, its greatest strength is the versatility of its built-in USB-C dock.
The Honor 20 is a competent mid-range smartphone that compares well to similarly priced competition. The Huawei connection is the only factor that might give prospective buyers pause for thought.
Stonking battery use is offset by a chip that restricts app usage.
The hybrid laptop has travel potential but won’t replace your main system.

There are dozens of welcome tweaks and improvements in Painter 2020 rather than any major new features. But even workflows and processes that haven't changed feel more fluid thanks to the performance enhancements.
Take the standard Echo Dot, adds some colors, parental controls, and kid-friendly apps and this is what you end up with.
Traditional ThinkPad virtues are on offer here, in a solid but portable form factor. Long battery life and rapid charge support head up the eye-catching features.
Processor and graphics upgrades make this Apple's fastest MacBook Pro yet; and although they're expensive, high-end configurations deliver good value for money.
For looks and style, the Doogee N10 certainly holds its ground against other, more expensive smartphones.
If you need a workhorse colour printer for primarily text-based documents, Canon's refillable-ink Pixma G5050 will quickly earn its keep.
The Cubot Quest is a superb shockproof, waterproof, rugged phone that is not too large for your hands -- or your pocket.
The Xperia 1's 21:9 4K OLED screen is outstanding, but its 3330mAh battery seems underspecified for this top-end 6.5-inch handset.
A mid-range handset with a ’CinemaVision’ screen and a 48MP main rear camera, the Motorola One Vision is solidly built and punches well above its weight. Battery life could be better though.
With optional LTE broadband available, the 13.3-inch ThinkPad X390 will appeal to mobile professionals. All-day battery life is feasible, but Lenovo's claimed two-day figure may be a stretch.

If you are tired of paying hundreds or even more than a thousand for a smartphone, Coolpad offers an attractive option in the Coolpad Legacy. It's been a rock over the past month, and I'm convinced most people would be perfectly satisfied with this $130 phone.
The OnePlus 7 is a decent mid-priced flagship-class smartphone. But buyers have a lot more choice in this price bracket these days.
RAS 17 gives mobile users the power of Windows desktops and applications from anywhere, more securely.
Ring's product offering now includes motion activated lights that for outside your home.
Even in its current form, Catalina looks like one of the most impressive updates that macOS has received in recent years.
It may not stand out in any way, but the Dynabook (Toshiba) Tecra A50 is solidly built and will do a reliable job for knowledge workers.
Google's Pixel 3A XL is half the price of a flagship phone.

Honor's entry-level 20-series handset offers decent battery life and performance, good cameras and plenty of internal storage. Among the downsides are Micro-USB for charging and an LCD rather than OLED screen.

Honor announced the latest member of its N-series lineup with beautiful design features like its Dynamic Holographic glass back and a 48 megapixel quad camera with artificial intelligence. It's available for hundreds less than the Huawei P30 Pro with many of the same features and functions.
Ring's Stick Up Cam Battery is a versatile battery

While much of the focus has been on the periscope telephoto camera of the P30 Pro, you can save a couple hundred dollars on the P30 and still have a very capable triple camera system. It's easier to handle, has a headphone jack, and a flat display so it may be favored over the other two P30 models.
The OnePlus 7 Pro may very well end up being the best bargain smartphone in 2019.

Asus deserves to have a success with the ZenFone 6. Long battery life, a configurable Smart Key, useful tweaks to Android and a clever camera system combine to make this a very impressive mid-range smartphone.

product name: Nomad Base Station Apple Watch Edition
product description: A wireless charging pad that can charge your iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch at the same time? It does exist.
It's still early days for the Wi-Fi 6 standard, but products based on the Draft 3.0 version are now available, including Netgear's Nighthawk AX range.
The 14-inch HP Chromebook 14A G5 has its drawbacks, including a moderate screen resolution, but it offers a very good keyboard and comes at an attractive price.

Garmin continues to roll out integrated music support to its line of GPS sports watches, along with a refined user interface and the best smartphone app of any sports watch. The Forerunner 245 Music is an outstanding sports watch for the masses and is designed to help you improve your fitness and lifestyle.
XGIMI H2 gives you a heck of a lot for your money – and is really worth the expenditure if you love the immersive experience of the big screen.
With its durable chassis, optional handle and hot-swappable batteries, this highly configurable laptop should suit a range of working environments.

The LG G8 ThinQ looks a lot like last year's G7 with some minor updates and a couple gimmicky inconsistent functions. However, it is an affordable flagship at $620 and offers most of what we see on the more expensive Samsung Galaxy S10 while also offering a ton of settings that let you fully customize your smartphone experience.
The Amarey A900 robot vacuum is an intelligent cleaner that cleans floors in a structured efficient way.
Beats’ Powerbeats Pro are more expensive than AirPods, but are they worth it?

Wireless headphones with active noise cancellation are a popular accessory for workers and business travelers. Bose and Sony are the leaders in this area, but Jabra just launched its latest offering that offers more for less.
The Vaio SX14 offers a slim, lightweight design and strong performance, along with a wide range of connectivity features. Battery life leaves room for improvement though.
Professional users in fields such as video, design and audio will appreciate the extra processor and graphics performance offered by the 2019 edition of the standard 27-inch iMac.
Apple brought the iPad Air back and it's one heck of a tablet.
Oppo can clearly innovate, but the company should also remember to cover the basics when designing a premium-priced handset like the Find X.
Need a new phone but don't want to spend a ton of money? You can't go wrong with the Moto G7.

It has a headphone jack, a Touch ID button, one camera on the back and one on the front, you don't have to think about battery life, and you can now use the Apple Pencil with it. If you want a small tablet, buy a new iPad Mini.
With two USB 3.1 ports, HDMI and an SD card slot, this useful hub will bring a laptop with single USB-C port up to ultrabook spec.
The 5.7-inch Moto G7 Play handles everyday tasks well and delivers good battery life, but is missing a couple of potentially key features.
This is a great-value 14-inch Windows notebook, but make sure you get the FHD IPS display.
The Akaso Trace 1 is the perfect dash cam for Uber and Lyft drivers who want to record what is going on outside – and inside the car.

product name: ZAGG Slim Book go - keyboard and folio case
product description: The Slim Book Go offers a protective case and a capable keyboard at a fraction of the cost of Apple's own keyboard.
The Doogee S90 and its magnetic modules can become every phone you have ever wanted – with durability thrown in for good measure
Samsung's newest wireless earbuds catch up to Apple's AirPods.
These dual-SIM 4G LTE devices link to a wide range of mobile networks worldwide, giving you secure and reliable connectivity over wi-fi.
The 14-inch Elitebook x360 1040 G5 is a 360-degree convertible laptop with solid build quality and a good range of specification choices, although high-end variants are very expensive.
Logitech's Slim Folio Pro provides a well designed and affordable alternative to Apple's own range of accessories.

The Fitbit Inspire HR is an extremely lightweight daily activity tracker that collects a vast amount of data. While the small display is limited, the Fitbit smartphone app provides all of the data in an attractive and useful form.
The Oppo RX17 Pro is a solid 6.4-inch smartphone with one standout feature: its battery subsystem. If your workload mix hits your phone's battery hard, this should be a big attraction.
This 15.6-inch Chromebook is well built and offers a good specification, including an upcoming 4K screen. We'd like more than 64GB of internal storage though.
At $160, and with the perfect mix of health apps, battery life, ease of use, the Versa Lite is easy to recommend for those with any interest in trying out a smartwatch.
This 6.39-inch Snapdragon 855-based smartphone delivers a great combination of features and performance, and is probably the best mid-priced handset available right now.
The Xperia 10 Plus's 21:9 screen equips it for video watching, but more internal storage and better battery life would be welcome.
If you want a much better view when reversing your car, you need to fit this nifty camera
If you're looking for an affordable workhorse laptop that can handle web browsing and Microsoft Office all day long, the convertible Chromebook Spin 13 has a lot to offer.

product name: HP ZBook Studio G5 Mobile Workstation
product description: The ZBook Studio G5 can be configured to handle high-end workloads, although the combination of a Xeon processor and a very bright 4K display will have an adverse effect on battery life.
The Xiaomi Mi MIX 3 is an impressive mid-range handset with a near-bezel-free screen thanks to its front camera slider.
The Armor 6 from Ulefone is a workhorse of a device with a range of useful tools.
The Mi 8 Lite from Xiaomi is aimed at consumers – but would be perfect for business use too.
The 6.2-inch Moto G7 Plus is as good a budget smartphone as you'll find today, but the competition in this market segment is hotting up.
The Alldocube X is a tablet with good build quality, a pared down interface and a good camera.
Samsung's mesh network setup does more than just provide Wi-Fi to all of your devices.
The Pocophone F1 is further proof that it's possible to deliver good performance, plenty of internal storage and relatively long battery life at a very competitive price.
The 7.2-inch Mate 20 X bridges the divide between smartphone and tablet. There are some usability issues, but overall it's an impressive device.
With its adjustable 28-inch touchscreen and stylus, the Surface Studio 2 offers designers a versatile platform that simply isn't available from rival all-in-one desktop PCs.
Epson's EcoTank printers offer genuine savings to organisations that need to print hundreds or even thousands of pages every month.
Amazon's over-the-air DVR is something you set up and forget about but has one big catch.
The Deebot 711 is a superb cleaner that remembers its cleaning path for a thorough clean.
Owners of a 2018 model iPhone now have an official option for a battery case.
A 4K touch screen and a sturdy 2-in-1 format should recommend this powerful laptop to mobile power users, but battery life is a concern.
The BV9600 Pro is a nice rugged phone, which would suit both corporate and consumer users.

The Huawei MateBook 13 provides a high screen-to-body ratio touchscreen experience with specs matching Apple's MacBook Air for hundreds less. It's an attractive aluminum machine designed to help you get work done wherever you may be while offering some improvements from Huawei's phone experience.
This 6.4-inch handset's impressive spec includes a 48MP main camera, a minimal-bezel screen, a novel front camera design, a top-end processor and plenty of internal storage.
The Denon AH-C820W scores well on sound quality and fit, and battery life is good. However, the usability of its all-important control buttons could be better.
A useful dash cam with a rotating camera to record inside-car events.
If Apple made robot vacuum cleaners, they would look like the Roborock C10
The Mi 8 Pro is a competent flagship-class smartphone at a good price, although a few compromises have been made in pursuit of affordability.
Windows Server 2019 brings key improvements to infrastructure roles, hyperconverged solutions and Azure integration.

It might not have the elegant design of the Mac Mini, but the Xeon processors and discrete GPU options of the Z2 Mini G4 mean that HP's alternative is in a different league when it comes to performance.

It's been a few years since Google released a tablet and the Pixel Slate is its first Chrome OS model. The Pixel Slate hardware is excellent, its full desktop browser offers unlimited potential, and it's not cheap.
Despite some limitations, this combination of pen, paper and mobile app could prove useful for knowledge workers, students and consumers.

The Asus ZenBook Pro UX580GD is big and heavy, and battery life isn't great. But the screen is superb, and there's plenty of CPU and GPU power on offer. The ScreenPad could be a winner, but Asus needs to refine the concept.
The Kobo Forma may not have a 3G option, but it does support the ePUB format and public library loans, making it a credible alternative to the Kindle Oasis.
The 13.9-inch Yoga C930 ticks most of the boxes for an ultraportable 2-in-1 convertible. This is a good laptop that's just shy of being a great one.
Excellent CPU, discrete GPU, RAM, storage and display options make for a versatile, if pricey, 15.6-inch ThinkPad.

LG's V-series phones have always been optimized for those creating still images and video content, as well as for those who want the best audio experience. The V40 is the best V-series ever with five cameras, Boombox speakers, and much more.
HP has given its Elite x2 detachable a significant upgrade, squeezing a 13-inch screen into a similar-sized chassis to its 11.6-inch predecessor.
It's been four years since Apple last updated the Mac mini. Just how does the refreshed Mini stack up? Quite well.

The Amazon Kindle Paperwhite was first introduced in 2012 and has been Amazon's most popular Kindle device. This year we get a thinner, lighter Kindle that can also be safely used by the pool, at the beach, and in the tub.
This long-overdue update refines the MacBook Air's elegant, lightweight design, while adding up-to-date features such as a Retina Display and the T2 security chip.

Apple switched up release strategies a bit in 2018 with the two high end $1,000+ models released initially, followed by one priced $250 to $350 less. The iPhone XR arrives in six color options and honestly it may be the best option for the masses.
This is a capable 5.9-inch smartphone running Android One, but similarly priced models are available with better features.

OnePlus just released its first phone in partnership with a US wireless carrier and early indications are that sales were brisk. The in-screen fingerprint scanner works well, the phone is very fast, cellular performance is stellar, and you will go a full day with the large capacity battery. Run to T-Mobile and buy this phone now.

Some people prefer to use minimal activity bands rather than full size watches, but that usually means giving up GPS, a color display, and more. Huawei just released its new Band 3 Pro that offers quite a bit for just $70.

Apple's powerful albeit pricey tablet is well designed and handles common tasks with ease. But Apple desperately needs to bring the iPad's software to the same level as its hardware to push the iPad's computing story forward.
Sweep and mop simultaneously with this powerful, multi-function robot cleaner.
The Mate 20 Pro is an outstanding flagship, but for €150 less you can pick up a less capable Mate 20. It's a bit too wide and has an LCD screen, but still has a headphone jack and three rear cameras.
The Band 3 looks like a bargain at the price, but you should consider the accuracy of its basic capabilities before taking the plunge.
The EliteBook 745 is well built and has a decent keyboard, but the 14-inch screen lacks brightness and colour vibrancy, while battery life could be better.
The Fitbit Charge 3 is an extremely comfortable activity tracker that captures a ton of data and then presents that data within a feature-rich Fitbit system.
Alldocube has cut corners to reach a very attractive price point for the dual-SIM M5S, but for the most part we're happy with the result.
This 'advanced ergonomic mouse' has an unusual design intended to reduce muscle strain, decrease wrist pressure and even improve posture.
Rugged phones from Doogee get better and better -- and its latest S80 waterproof phone does not disappoint at all.
The iPhone XS is the smallest of Apple's 2018 iPhone lineup, but don't discount it.
The 15.6-inch ThinkPad P1 is thin and light for a workstation-class laptop, and has plenty of options to maximise performance, at a price. Battery life is a concern though.
This 15.6-inch 360-degree convertible is solidly built and well specified, including a discrete GPU and a bundled stylus. Battery life could be better though.
Android through Google's lens has gotten really good, really fast.
The Mate 20 stands out from the smartphone crowd with features like 3D face unlock, an in-screen fingerprint reader, three cameras at the back and a new proprietary external storage format.
In a world of massive smartphones, there are still a few that comfortably fit in your hand and pocket. The Google Pixel 3 is the best small Android smartphone, but it's not quite perfect.
This latest Shenzhen MacBook-lookalike is a budget laptop delight.
Not satisfied with introducing a new rugged model to add to its range, the Doogee S70 also turns into a gaming smartphone with the addition of its Games Pad console
Cloud Manager is primarily aimed at managed service providers (MSPs) requiring remote access to and control of wi-fi networks that they manage on behalf of their small-business clients.
With two brushes and five cleaning modes, this automatic robot cleaner will clean hard and carpeted floors to suit your schedule.
As Apple's next OS version nears full release, the leading virtualisation tool for Mac users undergoes its annual upgrade.
This large-format monitor is suitable for entertainment, meeting room or reception area presentations, or for graphic design and finance professionals.
Sub-kilogram weight and all-day battery life are the standout features of this impressive 14-inch ultraportable.

product name: Apple Watch Series 4 (GPS) - space gray aluminum - smart watch with sport loop - black - 16 GB
product description: Apple's latest wearable improves exactly where customers wanted to see improvements; larger viewable area, longer battery life, and enhanced health and fitness functionality. It's a marvel of technology, but Samsung does it  better for less.
The VanTop Moment 3 is a low-cost action camera with easy-to-use interface and a lot of accessories.
Lenovo's ThinkPad E580 is a well-built laptop that, with smart configuration, could prove to be an attractive option for the canny business buyer.
Mojave focuses on the Mac's traditional strengths of simplicity and ease-of-use, while also bringing some of its newer mobile technologies onto the platform for the first time.
HP's EliteBook 1050 G1 is solidly built and offers plenty of configuration choices, along with impressive battery life.
The Mate 20 Lite is an affordable 6.3-inch smartphone with good battery life and a solid chassis.
